channel.title: Nixos on Sem Sinchenko

item.title: Using Pyenv with NixOS
item.description: The problem Recently I decided to switch from Ubuntu to NixOS. Do not ask me why, it was just for fun mostly. One of the main ideas behind NixOS is to separation of dependencies: each new package is installed into separate sandbox with own scope of dependencies. By design it should make system significantly more stable but sometimes there are problems. One of such problems I faced with pyenv â€“ a tool for simplifying python versions management.
